SEARCH
Package RequestSystem

Class RequestLoader

Object
RequestLoader
public class RequestLoader extends Object
The RequestLoader class is responsible for loading request records from an external data source into an in-memory map for processing and management. It utilizes the RequestService to handle the loading operation.

  • Constructor Details

    • RequestLoader

      public RequestLoader(Map<String,Request> requestRecords)
      Constructs a RequestLoader with a map of request records.
      Parameters:
      requestRecords - a map to store request records, keyed by their request IDs.

  • Method Details

    • loadInitialRequests

      public void loadInitialRequests()
      Loads the initial set of request records from the external data source into the in-memory requestRecords map. Each record is indexed by its request ID. If loading fails, an error message is displayed.
